title: This is what joy looks like, congratulations S.Korea.

author: Mrnicelefthand
text: Sadly it’s looking like S.Korea have to go through Brazil.

author: Innomenatus
text:
Pseudo race war will occur if both of them face each other.

I'm literally not kidding.

author: sour_quark
text:
Or this could be a chance for the young people of both countries to let go of the mutual hate and racism that they were taught from their elders and stop with the petty fights.

Who am I kidding yeah it’ll be a pseudo race war. Media will be milking it though

author: Innomenatus
text: I love me my pseudo race wars.

author: alphabet_order_bot
text:
Would you look at that, all of the words in your comment are in alphabetical order.

I have checked 1,204,348,793 comments, and only 234,818 of them were in alphabetical order.

text: In younger generations both countries are cheering each other rn
